page.title: 12LOCAL GOVERNMENT
page.content:
Our Domesday block contains a County Boundary,dividing{Lancashire}in the north from the metropolitan county of {Greater Manchester}in the south.
The town of{Ramsbottom}forms part of the{Bury Metropolitan Borough},and all services,including education,are organised from{Bury.
To the north of the county boundary lie the villages of{Stubbins}and Edenfield which are part of the{County {Borough of Rossendale.}In{Lancashire some services are organised by the Boroughs and some,such as education,by the County Council based in{Preston.
